title: On FL-145 form interrogatories, question 5, support provided others. Is this for spousal and child support only?
question: We have two businesses. For the first business, my husband gave loans to ebay independent contractors. For the second business, my husband paid the debts, the partnership draw and the personal water bill for the man that holds the sub contractor license that my husband used for the second business.
answers:
This is an interesting question. The answer is found in the definitions provided on the first page of the form:
Support means any benefit or contribution to the living expenses of another person, including gifts.
This means that it is not court ordered support, and it is not limited to support provided to spouses or children. Hope that helps.
Best of luck to you!
answer_card_text:
Answer
